text:
December 17, 1954
Mr. Waldo Abbot, Chairman
Network Acceptance Committee, NAEB
WUOM
University of Michigan
Ann Arbor, Michigan
Dear Waldo:
I am going to ask Jack Westbrook, WUOT, to
replace Bun Dawson. This puts Wright and Westbrook
from the same institution as your two sub-chairmen,
but that may be for the good instead of the bad. I
hope so.
For your general information I am attaching
a copy of an inquiry made to Board members simply
to indicate to you how I am trying to check before
making announcements.
I trust youâ€™re well, happy and sober. Best
regards to Em.
Sincerely,
Frank E. Schooley
President
FES:ftah
Enel
